name: Anise Hyssop
uses: Aromatic teas. Floral arrangements.

name: Black Eyed Susan
uses: Cheerful flowers. Resilient and great for playspaces.

name: Bloody Dock
uses: Yummy sour leaves. Deep magenta veins on spinach green leaves.

name: Calamus
uses: Water loving plant. Sweet smell. Great for damp play spaces.

name: Christmas Fern
uses: Great for playspaces and shady gardens.

name: Clary Sage
uses: Great smelling pollinator plant.

name: Comfrey
uses: Great for compost. Will run around and spread easily. Attractive drooping purple flowers.

name: Creeping Thyme
uses: Robust yet short plant. Great for walkways and playspaces.

name: Echinacea
uses: Beautiful pink flowers that pollinators will love. Good immune boosting medicine.

name: Elderberry
uses: Will run around and spread easily in damp soils. Bright and pungent immune boosting medicine.

name: Garden Sage
uses: An earthy smelly herb that is excellent for cooking.

name: Gian Turkish Plantain
uses: Robust and spreading. Great for playspaces and bug bites.

name: Goldenseal
uses: Woodland medicinal. Low and slow growing, bright yellow rooted beauty.

name: Lemon Balm
uses: Will run around and spread easily. Smells like the brightest lemons.

name: Lemon Grass
uses: Snip the leaves for delicious tea. Use the bulb and leaves in cooking.

name: Marigold
uses: Great for your vegetable garden or playspace. Bright and cheerful and keeps some bugs at bay.

name: Mullein
uses: Flowers in the second year. A wonderfully fuzzy herbal ally.

name: Partridgeberry
uses: Slow growing, low evergreen native ground cover.

name: Purple Basil
uses: Spicy annual. A warming addition to pesto and iced tea.

name: Rue
uses: Rich in folklore and medicine, this is a beautiful plant to add to your home garden.

name: Stinging Nettles
uses: Yes, they do sting. Spreads easily. You may want to grow in a container. Great for broths, cooking, and beverages.

name: Toothache Plant - Spilanthes
uses: Tincture or nibble for tooth pain. Be careful, it’s potent!

name: Tulsi Rama
uses: Tea, gentle stimulant.

name: Tulsi Temperate
uses: Tea.

name: Tulsi Vana
uses: Tea, used for stress, anxiety, heart disease, arthritis, diabetes, and dementia

name: Yarrow
uses: Beautifully lacy leaves and white flowers. Good first aid plant.
